Translations.Text: DEUS testimentum DICTUS O Jesus FILIUS Mary PERFECIT VOS dictus to people ‘FACTUS me my mater idols DEUS? ' He DICTUS VOS glorified Ego non utter quod est rectus! Habet ego dictus it Vos iam known it Vos know my thoughts ego non know Tuus thoughts! Vos know totus secrets

Ego told them unus quod Vos commanded me dictus ‘Vos worship DEUS my Dominus tuus Dominus. ' ego est testis them prout long prout ego vivens them. When Vos terminated my vita terra Vos became Watcher them. Vos testis totus things
Vos punish them they est Tuus constituents. Vos forgive them Vos est Almighty Wise

DEUS testimentum proclaim HOC est FERIA when truthful TESTIMENTUM saved their truthfulness. They deserved gardens flowing streams They abide therein forever DEUS pleased them they pleased EUM! Hoc est major triumph
To DEUS belongs sovereignty de caelum terra everything in them He est Omnipotent
